annotations.description: On this episode of How to Drink, I’m making a Jersey Sunset, an old variation on the sling. This cocktail calls for angostura bitters, but I used creole styl...
annotations.title: Jersey Sunset | How to Drink

textContent:
2oz Applejack
.5oz Gomme/Simple syrup
Float Angostura bitters
Twist of lemon

Stir and pour over ice into old fashioned
Float bitters on top
Garnish with fruit (blackberry)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cVV1fzanQ3A
title: Jersey Sunset
